thread.title: Don’t touch the actors: Field of Screams cast dishes on patrons who spoil the fun
thread.title_full: Don’t touch the actors: Field of Screams cast dishes on patrons who spoil the fun

author: TOM KNAPP | Staff Writer
title: Don’t touch the actors: Field of Screams cast dishes on patrons who spoil the fun
text:
Buy Now TOM KNAPP | Staff 
Anthony Farrell, Charles Stackhouse, Amanda Farrell and Jim Schopf (with Chokles the Clown) discuss patrons at Field of Screams during an interview in the LNP studio. Buy Now TOM KNAPP | Staff 
Jim Schopf and Chokles the clown discuss patrons at Field of Screams during an interview in the LNP studio. Buy Now TOM KNAPP | Staff 
Anthony Farrell, left, Amanda Farrell and Charles Stackhouse discuss patrons at Field of Screams during an interview in the LNP studio. FIELD OF SCREAMS promotional photo 
An actor menaces patrons at the Den of Darkness, one of several attractions at Field of Screams. centerpiece
